item.title: R to @DrBobLJMU: I know how desperate everyone is for a #ByromGulls update. The scaffolding disappeared not long after it went up - not sure what that was all about. There's three chicks, not two. Growing up fast. A while before they'll fly tho'

item.title: "What if you were using the machine and worried you were about to be raided and the device captured? Switch the equipment off and then find some way to dispose of the key tape. "Destroy it. Burn it. In the last instance, you could eat it," https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-61712621
